story: Sam found an old red bicycle in his grandfather's garage. When he rang the bell three times, something magical happened - the bike could travel through time! Sam visited the dinosaurs, met knights in shining armor, and saw pirates sailing the seven seas. But after each adventure, he always returned home safely. One day, Sam decided to travel to the future to see himself as a grown-up. Future Sam told him, 'The best adventures are the ones you create right now, in the present.' Sam realized that while time travel was fun, his real life was the greatest adventure of all.
story_summary: A boy discovers a time-traveling bicycle and learns that his present life is just as adventurous as any journey through time.
